resources.string:
We hope you will have a pleasant experience in using your smartphone with FarsiTel operating system. To always have the latest feature and applications, please keep your phone updated, and visit us at farsitel.comâ€Ž.

By a few simple steps you can set up your %s. Please touch "Begin" to start.

Please touch "Tutorial" if you want to learn a thing or two about your phone.
\n
Setting up a Google account requires a reliable internet connection, so we removed that from this steps. You can add your Google account later by going to "Accounts & sync" in Settings.
